divs: sighting detailsi was looking at the moon from my kitchen skylight. i had a parshal glass celing like a green house attached to the kitchen i liven in the country. i saw lights bobbing from the woods across the street. they got brighter and brighter. i heard no noise as it approched my house. i saw a large light t looked like a sm plane. but then it hovered over my roof as i looked up i saw landing geer but it hovered for 15 sec unlike a plane. then i freaked out. went to bed a hour later and i then had a horriable dream.. in the dream i was in teh same spot i was in the kitchen.. but as i looked up to the glass celing i saw a reflection of a whiteish figure standing behind me a small human like being. the eyes were big and it had a whitish shine or suit on and it was a dull glowing suit the looked like it was moist or wet. i got scared in the dream and saw my 2 labs laying on the living room floor they were asleep. i yelled for them and stomped my feet and they wouldnt wake up. my dogs always wake up when i call for them.. then i woke up.. i have had dreams like this were i was in a ship with 6 fingered ppl. human like with bright eyes and dark hair. all i remember was the ship was strangely cold and the wall were almost breathing.. but i saw earth out the ship window and the man in the control seat took me home, he spoke to me with little worrds or a thought all i remember was he let me know it was time to go home. oh and there were a lot of other peole there. like little kids and farmers or truck drivers. i am typo 0 negitive blood and so is my dad we both have these storys but my dad was stripped naked and left in a corn field when he was 17. i think they have been following me for years... my x husband worked at nasa and the pentagan and he said the navy knows they are here and there is a portal that opens up on earth (more than 1) and ships\enitys come thru.. i think its opens when there is a full moon. my cousin was a navy seal for 20 years he was really high up and he was killed ( no accident) last year.
Summary: somethin hovering over my kitchen. I had a glass celing in my kitchen.
